name: Don't Kill Them
description:
You are the lava monster. Lava runs through your body to your head. The humans are afraid of you and throw offerings in your pit. But there's a big misunderstanding: you are a vegan monster!  

Save the animals to score points and try to not burn them with your lava head.

Instructions A = Left B = Right Space = Hold the lava Tips You can miss only 10 animals Break all the rocks and save all the animals to score bonus points Chaining perfects can lead to interesting results...
